data.lyric:
[ti:玉（Jade）]
[ar:张艺兴]
[al:玉（Jade）]
[by:v_yyccchen]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]玉 (Jade) - 张艺兴 (LAY)
[00:01.35]Lyrics by：LAY(张艺兴)/Dante Leon/Adam Halliday
[00:02.71]Composed by：LAY(张艺兴)/Shane Lindstrom/Dante Leon/Adam Halliday
[00:04.07]Arranged by：Murda Beatz/LAY(张艺兴)
[00:05.43]（翻唱节选自京剧《霸王别姬》选段）
[00:08.70]
[00:21.08]M-m-m-murda
[00:21.66]
[00:22.42]Lay
[00:22.71]
[00:23.33]Do you know all the power that you hold baby
[00:26.37]My wrist is froze they get blinded by the stones baby
[00:29.67]I need it
[00:30.50]To keep away the pain
[00:31.55]
[00:32.30]Stay with me everyday
[00:33.90]Do you feel the same Oh baby yeah
[00:36.44]
[00:37.08]She always know what I want like she's psychic
[00:40.21]You're a super hero baby let me be your side kick
[00:43.56]Ain't seen nothing like it
[00:45.07]Everything timeless
[00:46.78]They've been looking for it
[00:48.25]But I know where to find it
[00:49.87]玉
[00:50.23]
[00:51.68]玉 玉 玉 玉 玉
[00:53.55]
[00:54.94]没人比你珍贵 You
[00:56.88]
[00:58.22]只有我懂的美 You
[01:00.25]
[01:01.23]But n nobody shine like
[01:03.28]玉
[01:03.62]
[01:04.80]玉 玉 玉 玉 玉
[01:06.67]
[01:08.23]And nobody shine like you
[01:09.86]
[01:11.49]I know you like diamonds too
[01:13.35]
[01:14.53]But n nobody shine like
[01:16.58]与众不同 然后晶莹剔透
[01:18.90]
[01:19.70]最珍贵 玉的美
[01:21.97]
[01:23.09]与众不同 然后晶莹剔透
[01:25.58]
[01:26.34]最珍贵 你的美
[01:29.09]懂你的人 有仁义礼智信 Baby
[01:32.21]你的独特 懂的人才有资格般配
[01:35.57]I need it
[01:36.34]有你才有完美
[01:37.90]君子非你不追
[01:39.04]
[01:39.66]神秘的翡翠
[01:41.10]完美的配对
[01:42.44]You belong by my side
[01:43.89]keep you with me all the time
[01:45.71]I get lost in your eyes
[01:47.23]but that's right where I reside
[01:48.98]With my woo
[01:49.75]
[01:50.72]You still make me nervous but it's cool
[01:52.64]
[01:53.89]That's my lil baby that's my woo
[01:56.11]She always know what I want like she's psychic
[01:59.06]You're a super hero baby let me be your side kick
[02:02.36]Ain't seen nothing like it
[02:03.99]Everything timeless
[02:05.17]
[02:05.90]They've been looking for it
[02:07.34]But I know where to find it
[02:09.00]玉
[02:09.34]
[02:10.56]玉 玉 玉 玉 玉
[02:12.44]
[02:13.77]没人比你珍贵 You
[02:15.76]
[02:17.26]只有我懂的美 You
[02:19.15]
[02:20.18]But n nobody shine like
[02:21.86]自从我随大王东征西战
[02:23.25]玉
[02:23.86]玉 玉 玉 玉 玉
[02:25.51]
[02:27.12]And nobody shine like you
[02:28.82]
[02:30.49]I know you like diamonds too
[02:32.46]
[02:33.36]But n nobody shine like
[02:35.08]玉
